items.title: This Company Makes Products Without Forever Chemicals. Tariffs Just Made That Harder
items.description: Caraway is known for its luxurious PFAS-free cookware, but they have had to raise prices following tariffs.

items.title: To Design a Microplastics Filter, This Company Copied Nature
items.description: To solve overflow problems with its microplastics filter for washing machines, CLEANR turned to the animal kingdom for inspiration.

items.title: 8 Ways to Craft Enticing Product Descriptions in the ChatGPT Era
items.description: Founders share their strategies for refining language that elevates brand awareness and attracts consumers.

items.title: Apple Just Added a Brilliant iPhone Feature to Help Businesses and Consumers Communicate
items.description: It means that talking with people who speak other languages is about to get a whole lot easier.

items.title: 10 Things Dad Actually Might Want for Father’s Day
items.description: From robot vacuums to skateboards to steaks, this gift guide offers all sorts of ideas for all sorts of dads.
